website_summaries.verdict: Very good unit that just misses the mark because of poor rechargeable battery.
pros: Simulated leather case eliminates glare, great audio, solid HD video and handles temperature extremes
Sensor that locks video in case of accident
cons: The 8GB memory card that comes with the unit is inadequate and included rechargeable battery is awful

customer_reviews.title: It's a very good camera with extremely clear video
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good camera with extremely clear video, large viewing angle, small size, good mount, no shaking. Audio quality is also pretty good. The setup is easy. Plug it in and it works. Product arrived earlier than expected. The most feature I like this camera is the leather-style surface which I haven’t seen on any other dash cameras. It reduce the reflection from the windshield, and it looks just classy.
customer_reviews.author: ValuedCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great dash cam to buy yourself peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this camera for nearly 9 months, and we love it. The peace of mind is definitely worth this purchase. In fact, we are purchasing a second ITrue X3 Dash Cam for our second vehicle. Pros: Wide angle 170* capture Easy to save videos Records audio Accommodates up to 32 gig SD card, which allows for over 5 hours of loop. The base has never fallen off our windshield, even in Florida heat Cons: I want one for my back window, too.
customer_reviews.author: Nestissa

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Will let you down when u need it most.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Update July 2018. Changing to one star. Failed to record when I needed it the most during an accident. Power was on and flashing red circle but was not overwriting the old files, even though I had it set to overwrite. I formatted the card, gave it one more try. Red circle is flashing, but it is sometimes recording, sometimes not. Unreliable junk. I also cannot manually record important events that I want to save. Junk. This company needs to learn how to design a drive recorder from folks like pioneer, Yupeteru, and kenwood.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: The high end stuff gets a nice camera but most are way over priced and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I did my homework before purchasing this dash Camera. I reviewed very high as well as the economical platforms. Save your money on both. The high end stuff gets a nice camera but most are way over priced and the low end well the old adage "You get what you pay for" is true. There is a lot of junk out there. However, the iTrue X3 gives excellent pictures, great features and the best bang for the buck. I use it with my Dodge Challenger at the race track. No need for expensive sport cameras just attach your X3 to the windshield and run the 1/4 mile track. Lots of fun. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: D. BODKIN

customer_reviews.title: Gave Me Peace of Mind When Driving
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, bought this back in March 2016 and it worked perfectly until June 2018. The reason why it stopped working was because I accidentally knocked it off the suction cup that was on the window and it fell and broke. It was $109.00 when I first bought it and now it’s down to $80.00, so that’s another plus. I went ahead and ordered the exact same dash cam. Overall, it was fairly easy to use. It records in HD. I pulled tons of footage off this thing from idiot drivers doing idiotic things.
customer_reviews.author: WatchTheShow

customer_reviews.title: SD card issues and battery is inneficient.
customer_reviews.text: Same as other reviewers: The camera worked fine for a while now it says there is no SD card in my camera but there is, I have to take out the SD card and reinsert it back in to get it working. Battery does not hold any charge. Only works connected to power in the car. Giving up (out of warranty anyways) and ordering a different brand, Image was fine while the camera lasted, but the camera itself cannot be used anymore with the current failure to read the SD (I tried 2 different ones, tired to format, tried to reset)
customer_reviews.author: KeyserSose

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over 3 years and it used to work great for the first 1-2 years. The camera starts up and records video but will continue to record over the set video limit and this seems to affect the way the footage is saved. When going back to review video of an incident on the memory card, half the files were corrupt. This product doesn't reassure me that if in an accident I'd be able to have video evidence. I'm not sure how long ago this started but I'm not happy to have lost over $100 on a substandard product.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I researched many dash cams and the choices are unlimited. I bought this one based on some magazine articles and the feedback here that mentions the excellent customer service. I had to contact the seller a couple of times and he responded instantly with the information I needed. The camera itself appears to be of great quality and the video quality is outstanding. I hard wired it to get rid of the cumbersome cigarette lighter cord. I like the fact that it can be set to turn on and off automatically every time I drive the car.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Very nice picture.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the unit from Amazon. This works nice, much better than the previous one I had. I left most of the settings at default. I did change the light frequency to 60Hz. and set the time. Once I figured out how to get to the setup menus it was fairly easy to adjust. I really like how clear and precise the video from this is. This I could recommend and not worry about it.
customer_reviews.author: John KaBang

customer_reviews.title: Very good suction cup dash camera
customer_reviews.text: It works so good I purchased a second one to have one for front and back windows. The suction cups work real well after coating with dishwasher detergent. They then hold so well I can remove then reinstall the cameras without loosing the suction cup. The cups have remained tight for over 3 months here in the hot Texas summers.
customer_reviews.author: Donald L

customer_reviews.title: This is an average dash cam.
customer_reviews.text: This is an average dash cam. I was able to review footage that was full HD when I needed to. Overall it is a nice dash cam. I wish it accepted 64GB or larger micro sd cards. It only lasted 18 months until the what looks like the battery swelled up cracked open the case. This is my first dashcam so I'm not sure if this is normal. I will not be purchasing another product from this company.
customer_reviews.author: AF/DF

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera Overall
customer_reviews.text: Gave it a 4 star instead of 5 because the usb cable (for connecting to the computer) had a defect and was unusable. I reached out to the company via support email and never heard back. USB Cable aside, I am very happy with the camera. Good picture quality. Build quality feels pretty good. User interface is a little bit difficult to use, but is really only needed when initially adjusting settings. Its very easy to take on and off of the mount. The included Sandisk SD Card was great added bonus. The included SD Card can hold around 80-120 minutes of footage depending on the quality you choose to record at.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Best Choice for My Car
customer_reviews.text: It's simple to set up. After reading the guide and making a few choices, it is plug and record. The video is clear and high quality. It took a little work to get the mount in the right place and stay there, but it was worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: William S

customer_reviews.title: Nice little Gizmo, but this one is Defective. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.text: Nice Dash Cam - However, when I received the item it had already been opened and the security tab was already torn back. Item is defective, can't retrieve the video card, and can't access the Setup Feature, and yes I followed the instructions in the booklet. It is permanently set at factory default dated January 1st, 2015. Sending it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Bishmaya

customer_reviews.title: This camera takes great video and stills
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great video and stills. I'm still learning about all the wonderful things that it can do but I will purchase another one now for the 2nd car. I did modify the mount slightly so the camera can swivel without being detached from the windshield. This was not a difficult modification. I just purchased the GPS module and am looking forward to using that capability in my travels. Thanks so much for making such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for the long term...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in Jan 2016, it worked fine for about a year, then lots of issues. Seems to have an internal battery for time/date stamp, but no way to get to it unless you disassemble the whole thing. Also the playback feature from keypad quit working. Also the power plug became intermittant so I had to glue it in place. Finally, it now seems to not be storing the videos. Not worth the $105 I paid for it. The quality just is not there.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome dash camera
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome dash camera. I hooked it up on the front wind shield from inside and till today it work great. The video quality both day & night is excellent. The camera looks small but it give me a wide range and good quality video, good resolution.The mount adhered strongly to my windshield and held the camera firmly. I am also thinking of buying for my rear window.This is a great unit and I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ketan Soneji

customer_reviews.title: Night vision is surprisingly superior, much better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: The camera is worth every penny. Daytime shooting is superb, even gets plates within reason. Night vision is surprisingly superior, much better than I expected, it will get what you need to cover yourself. The camera is so simple I'm not even going to bother. When it has power it records, when the card runs out of room it will start to remove the old files that you don't need. If the videos files are locked (manually or triggered by G-sensor), it will not be overwritten. Night vision is surprisingly superior, much better than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Tama H

customer_reviews.title: Use it all the time. Great support.
customer_reviews.text: Great support from the seller. Responds promptly to email inquiries. Bought 2, seller replaced one that kept freezing then buttons stopped working. Camera works pretty well. Carry extra memory cards if you are traveling. If you're traveling and want to save something just change the card. You may need tweezers to extract it. Camera time stamp clock runs fast. 3.5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: GiveMeSubtitles

customer_reviews.title: it is one of the best camera's for the money
customer_reviews.text: When this camera works, it is one of the best camera's for the money. Easy to setup and use. However when you NEED it.... your odds of being able to play back a video are about 5%. Today I was at a light where there was a major crash at the intersection. I was talking with my passenger so didn't see exactly what happened, but the dash cam did. Got home to play it.... will not playback. Have reported this issue many times to developer with no resolution. Tossing mine in the trash and replacing with a more reliable product.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Elster

customer_reviews.title: Great Product...but...
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a great dash cam. No problems at all. However, I would give it five stars, but I am only giving it four because the battery life is non existent. Other than this and having longest cord I have ever seen in my life, it works great. The clarity is wonderful!! I love the fact that even though I hate the long cord and that it must stay plugged up, it turns right on when I start the car, and it turns right off as soon as I shut the car off.
customer_reviews.author: Ms d of 5

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this dash cam a few months ago. It works great. Video quality is excellent. Easy to install, and was recording within an hour after delivery. I had a concern with the video playback. I emailed the manufacturer on a Saturday afternoon, and I received an answer within a couple of hours -- on a Saturday night! You can't ask for better customer service than that. Anyway, had a concern in playing back a video. Joseph (manufacturer representative) gave detailed instructions on how to connect the camera to my computer, and access the recording playback. It worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great dash cam
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dash cam. We love it. I did add a larger memory card, but it really didn't need it. It works great & is easy to use. I purchased this dash cam after almost (within inches) hitting a bicyclist who pulled out in front of me. I wanted to protect myself from a " he said, she said ", type of scenario and now I feel very reassured having photo proof of who is at fault if something happens. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: froghollow

customer_reviews.title: Great Dash Cam!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had many dash cams in my driving career, this one especially holds up in hours of driving without freezing up or any other problem other cameras have. Some don't charge or the screen blacks out or just quits recording for unknown reasons.I've had other name brands from truck stops and they just don't hold up. This ITrue camera has worked flawlessly for the almost 3 month I've had it. Great product in my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Mike64

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last - multiple issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dash cam in aug 2016 and it is now no longer working. The light stays on all the time unless I completely drain the battery and it now just freezes most of the time when I try to turn it on - I have never been able to use it without the power cord being plugged in. I wish there was a troubleshooting guide for these issues. I feel like it should still work after 2.5 years especially since I paid a bit more for a nicer dash cam.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellant Produce
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for a trip I was taking, in the last month three drivers have crossed over into my lane, no accidents yet. It is not to larger as to obstruct vision and it does function well both in day and night modes. The instruction booklet needs some work, about 25% of how to operate it will be try and see method. It is worth having a recording if your involved in an accident so there is no dispute as to what happened. I would recommend this produce.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: The dash cam works great. It covers all the action in front of ...
customer_reviews.text: The dash cam works great. It covers all the action in front of the vehicle. We are both getting older now and I feel that it would help if there were an accident. I am over 71 years old and feel that at this age the officer covering the accident may feel that age had something to do with it. I am hoping never to get in one but if I do the camera may help. thanks for the great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Video is very good and clear with great color
customer_reviews.text: camera seems to work well, only used one trip and downloaded the Drive app from the Web, did not have a CD Rom to use the one provided in package. Controls are a little confusing but after you use it for a short time they get easier. Video is very good and clear with great color. Audio is weak but i did not buy it for audio. Have yet to try the motion setting as a monitor for the RV while parked and away. Mount needs a bit more offset to give better windshield clearance and a stand mount for surveillance monitoring would be nice for RV use
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Utsler

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: WORKS GREAT AND IT'S AUTO ON AND OFF SO I DON'T HAVE TO MESS WITH ANYTHING. I WAS IN AN ACCIDENT AND IT SUCCESSFULLY RECORDED THE WHOLE THING, THE POLICE ASKED ME TO SEND THEM A COPY OF THE RECORDING. THIS CAN REALLY HELP SHOW WHO WAS RESPONSIBLE IN AN ACCIDENT, HOPEFULLY ITS NOT YOU. LOVE IT, I'M THINKING ABOUT GETTING A SECOND ONE FOR THE REAR WINDOW.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Kent Street

customer_reviews.title: All in all this is a excellent cam for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have tried various cams, but this is the best ever. The resolution is excellent and it is easy to use. The only problem I had was the window sticker that holds the cam kept falling from the windshield. I corrected this with a 3M double sided tape square. All in all this is a excellent cam for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Yeas47

customer_reviews.title: not too big video quality is very good night vision quality is better than I expected Wide ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Sleek design, not too big video quality is very good night vision quality is better than I expected Wide angle Cons: It doesn't automatically turn off as advertised on my 2004 Alero. Maybe the car is too old, will try again on a newer car and update this Manual is not very helpful, English translation is barely understandable
customer_reviews.author: J Li

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect it to last
customer_reviews.text: 9-5-19 update: Camera basically fell apart. Looks like the internal battery overheated/malfunctioned and ballooned, causing the camera casing to break apart. Camera has been great so far. Picture and video quality is good. It's cheap insurance to have some footage if an incident ever happened out on the road. Deducted 1 star just because the controls and functions aren't very intuitive. I'm usually pretty good at figuring things out, but I find myself referring back to the manual whenever I need to go through the device and review/delete videos.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Graziani

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Great Camera and smaller than you think
customer_reviews.text: WOW!, get one, get two. works great and the clear picture / video is great. I have had no issues thus far and taken it on 2 long, 24 hour trips. it records great. able to capture the view of the moving car, and it is smaller than you think so it is out of sight. recordings come out SUPER CLEAR with HD detail.
customer_reviews.author: RAY D

customer_reviews.title: Great Dash Cam !!!
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a dash cam and it was horrible in terms of functions. This ITRUE X3 dash cam is so much better and $100 LESS! What a great dash cam. - Loop recording (automatically deletes oldest videos if full) - Locked files (manually locked or triggered by G-sensor in a accident) will not be automatically deleted. - Sound is better than my current Cam - Has a LCD screen - Records automatically when turning on the engine - Has a built in battery so you can take it out of the car and view the videos directly on the device I'm probably forgetting something but I LOVE this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Chao

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: It's ok, I don't hate it, but it's not going to be my favorite. Lately it's been jamming up, I have to unplug it and reset/re-format it to get it to work again. I'm a commercial driver my cameras are mounted and working in the windshield 24/7 so I've got to be able to have a reliable product. This ones ok but I wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt H.

customer_reviews.title: Undependable
customer_reviews.text: When it works the videos are fine, just as advertised. But some videos are blank, black screen. It plays utter darkness for whatever duration you have set. Next segment plays just fine. Undependable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen E

customer_reviews.title: buggy
customer_reviews.text: need to reformat the memory card every few days or it will not function. comes without a memory card but that is not mentioned in the advertising. lots of glare picked up at night.
customer_reviews.author: james langston

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the money, take my words to the bank.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing dash cam if you can read and follow the directions in the manual. Video is perfect even at night before 8pm. Captures full view of the frontal vision in .The looping stuff is incredible because it helps to be current. I will suggest getting SD card 32gb so you can save more pictures on it. Always download the day's picture, is my suggestion. Well constructed dash cam for the price .
customer_reviews.author: Godwin N.

customer_reviews.title: wow this camera will do the job I like that the screen stays on east to use great ...
customer_reviews.text: wow this camera will do the job I like that the screen stays on east to use great angles and night clarity and great customer service I had originally bought another brand that was rated very good no ever returned my email some people don't care about support and its everything these manuals arnt always in a great explanation as these cams can have little issues in all great product you can buy this with confidence I did not get paid in any way for this review
customer_reviews.author: Enrique J. Pimentel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera in April 2016 and absolutely love it! Even captured a hit-and-run in a low light situation (2AM) and the camera was able to get the license plate from the two cars in front of me. Last month I had an issue with the memory card and within hours their customer support had a new one in the mail for me. I highly recommend this camera. The video quality is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander P Roubian

customer_reviews.title: Overall I'm satisfied with this dash cam
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm satisfied with this dash cam. The video quality is fine, it's easy to install, and the manual provides sufficient information. I was able to test and understand most functions in a relatively short amount of time. One thing that seems counter-intuitive to me is that the USB port is located on the top side of the camera, so the power cable must bend 90 degrees before it reaches the cigarette lighter receptacle which sits near your knees, and it wouldn't have to if the port was located at the bottom. However, once it's hooked up, you probably won't notice it until you need to detach the cable or camera unit.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality video
customer_reviews.text: No issues with the camera so far. Good quality video, get a little grainy at night, but for the money you can't beat it. Come on automatically when starting the car and I have put a 32gb card in it so it can record many days of video. I think 32gb is the biggest you can put in it as I tried a 64gb and it did not work.
customer_reviews.author: patrick renick

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera so far. I have been using it non stop for about three months and works as designed. Picture is clear, fairly easy to change functions if desired while driving (microphone, lock recorded loop, etc...). Some people on here do not like the large lens with the chrome ring around it but it does not bother me. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, easy to use, and reliable!
customer_reviews.text: This dash cam is the absolute best value for cameras in this price segment. Camera is feature packed and records video with a really wide field of view. Battery Life is pretty good as most cameras I've owned in this segment last for 5 minutes or come with no battery at all. I only ran into one small quirk and it wasn't with the cam itself but the mount that came with it. there was a small bolt that appeared to be missing from it so I wasn't able to lock the camera into my desired position. Customer Service sent me a new mount and all is was fine. Highly recommend this camera, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: I barley notice it when I am driving and the storage space is great. The fact that I can put a 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: I swear this camera paid for itself when I took it out for a test for the first time. I barley notice it when I am driving and the storage space is great. The fact that I can put a 10 minute loop on it is perfect. What I mean by that is it will record for 10 mins and then create a new file without missing a beat. This camera is great.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The X3 camera is an excellent dashcam for the price. At 1080p, you can read license plates at a reasonable distance and night time performance is good as well. Another positive is that the mount rotates to give a view of the driver for police encounters and other situations. The only downside to this is that it requires a bit of force to get it to rotate, but nothing ridiculous. Overall, it's a great product that I've recommended to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Coulter

customer_reviews.title: So impressed I bought a second one for my other vehicle!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dash cam I've seen. It's a fair price and works great. It was so good I bought another for my other car. I've also made a mount for my motorcycle. I bought a 32 gig card for it and never have to worry about it not recording when I need it to. It would be better if it had a full size card instead of the micro ones but it plugs right into the computer and reads as mass storage.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera Value
customer_reviews.text: This camera is really a value. It produces a beautiful HD 16x9 picture and has many features. It has a photo mode that allows you to take high res photos. It's footprint is very compact and fits on the windshield right next to the mirror. I use a 32gig mrcro SD card for storage. I don't know how many hours that is but it's a lot. My only complaint is that the mount doesn't secure the camera very well and you have to really press the camera into the mount to keep it from sliding off.
customer_reviews.author: J. McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Great Dash Cam
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the camera, and would recommend it to others. After playing with the settings, and becoming familiar with it, I can't complain. The videos are clear, even those from night time. The cord is really long, and you can hide it easily. I was sent an email that I can reply to with any questions that I might have. This was bought as a gift, and I want one for myself now.
customer_reviews.author: HmSkillit

customer_reviews.title: I quality of the film clip was just amazing. When though the wreck as on my right ...
customer_reviews.text: This dash cam is unbelievable. I came upon a wreck. The traffic was slow and you had to keep your eyes on the car ahead. When I got back home I took the cam and hooked it up to my computer. I quality of the film clip was just amazing. When though the wreck as on my right side I could tell that this cam has a very wide angle lens and it's not a distorted.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Great dashcam
customer_reviews.text: ThIs dash cam takes great videos and pictures. The suction cup mount sticks well to the windshield, but mine has a sun shade with raised bumps and it won't stick to that. The mount also doesn't rotate to each side but I read other reviews that explained how to correct this. The interface is also easy to use, you should definitely consider this model if you are looking for a dashcam.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Eyes on the road.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera. Easy to set up and takes very good video. Once it is set up to your liking it takes care of itself. I have it mounted behind my rear view mirror and it is totally out of the way and does not hinder my vision what so ever. A great witness should the need ever present itself (hopefully not). I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: zinken

customer_reviews.title: Loved the large display on the dashcam as well as ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved the large display on the dashcam as well as the length of the cord. Packaged very nicely and records like a charm. The one issue that is keeping it from 5 stars is the buttons don't tend to work on the first push and sometimes not at all. Granted, I rarely ever need to push them but when I do it takes a couple of minutes. Lastly, it has frozen a couple times and the only way for me to get it to work again is to drain the battery. Would still recommend 4/5 stars
customer_reviews.author: John Sturzenegger

customer_reviews.title: Died after a month
customer_reviews.text: Lasted all of one month. Now it is frozen. It comes on but doesnt record and when the car is turned off it stays on until the battery dies (used to turn off when car turned off). Also doesn't auto adjust to night time light levels and can't access menus. Was great while it lasted but poor reliability. UPDATE: Vendor reached out with offer to replace but first asked if I would try to update firmware. Turned out camera had current firmware but discovered that the flash memory was bad (could not format). I put a different card in and camera worked fine. Vendor sent a replacement flash memory and was very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to learn based on the manual that comes with ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Enables me to feel confident to have a visual image to document an accident. As such, it provides proof to an insurance company of who was really responsible for any accident that may occur. Easy to learn based on the manual that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dana Weinberg

customer_reviews.title: gps logger and Ultra 32GB micro work beautifully. It took a while to figure out how ...
customer_reviews.text: The camera, gps logger and Ultra 32GB micro work beautifully. It took a while to figure out how to get the gps to show on my computer while looking at the video, but Joseph w/ support was able to walk me thru it. I haven't tried any other dash cams, and don't intend to. I'm still waiting for the 2 yr protection plan that I purchased and have not received anything yet.
customer_reviews.author: SWATTEAM

customer_reviews.title: Died after 12 months of use
customer_reviews.text: Had this dash cam for about a year before it completely died, didn't hold up to the Texas heat I guess. I wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one camera, and after seeing the quality of the video and picture, I ordered a second one for my husband’s car. I believe this is a good product and a good price as comparison with others. Endless looping recording, automatically on/off controlled by the engine, automatically overwriting old videos, automatically lock the video in an accident triggered by G-sensor.... so many great features! Already thinking of buying two more as rear view cameras. . Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: penny

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: After doing a lot of research on dash cams, I decided on the X3. After an 1100 mile trip and using it the entire time, I am very pleased with the choice I made. The HD quality is great during the day and also at night. The quality was surprising even during a very bad rain storm. I would recommend this camera to anyone who is serious about recording their trips. I am also considering buying one to attach to my motorcycle windshield.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for security and safety minded.
customer_reviews.text: Took a little reading but then it was set-up and has been working steadily ever since. Got this as an Xmas present for my husband after her showed me yet another shocking dash cam video. He was pleasantly surprised and loves that it switches on with a motion detector even when you're not in the car.
customer_reviews.author: richard/sharon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Save yourself the time and money itrue ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Save yourself the time and money itrue is 1 of the best cameras out there. The only feature it lacks id say is a gravity sensor that turns the camera on and starts recording if the car gets hit in the parking lot. Otherwise everything is good. I suggest you watch a brief preview on YouTube just to see the actuall size and performance of the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Loading

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product Great Company!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ITrue dash cam a couple of months ago and it is an "out of this world" product. this thing works awesome and it does exactly what it claims to do. The instructions were written clearly and easy to understand. in fact I love this product so much shortly after, I bought a second one. Also the company is a very nice company who took the time to thank me for the purchase and offered to be of assistance in any way they could if there was a problem or if I had questions. Awesome Awesome product. ,
customer_reviews.author: Wayne H.

customer_reviews.title: So far I've been well pleased with this economical little beauty
customer_reviews.text: I bought the ITrue X3 Dash Cam about a month ago. Setup instructions are clear and I had the camera installed and operating in my car within a half hour. I bought a larger memory card (32gb) at the same time, which allows me to record two or three hours driving at the hi=highest 1080P resolution. The videos have been amazingly sharp. I'm trying one of the lower resolutions now so I can get a full day of continuous recording without over-writing on a trip I'm planning. So far I've been well pleased with this economical little beauty!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: The iTrue X3 lives up to its excellent reviews
customer_reviews.text: The ITrue X3 dash cam has replaced a low priced unreliable dash cam I bought a few months ago. The previous camera came with a poorly written instruction manual and no customer service. The iTrue X3 has a readable manual and my questions are answered quickly when I contact iTrue at their gmail address. All video is clear and night time video is unbelievably clear. Using the buttons to access and set options is easy although it took me a few minutes to master this capability. I probably should have read the excellent instruction manual more closely. Bottom line: no complaints after several weeks of using the camera.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: this camera works great. I bought one at first to test because I had issues with another camera. Once I saw how well it worked. I purchased two more cameras for my other vehicles. Would highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: Accident caught on video
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing video...i just had a accident and i stopped but got rear ended..video caught reason i had to stop short but to sad not the person behind. Quality is AMAZING
customer_reviews.author: Brandon T

customer_reviews.title: The ITrue X3 Is A Great Product
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, it was obvious the X3 was the best Dash Cam to buy. All the reviews are correct. It is very easy to set-up and the instructions are easy to understand. All I have to do is unplug the unit when I am waiting in line or when I arrive home, then plug it back into the accessory plug when I want to start recording again. I was also very impressed with the ITrue company by receiving e-mails from them to let me know how they can be contacted and if I have any questions about the X3. Have been referring the ITrue X3 Dash Cam to every one I know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I found this camera on the Best Dash Cameras of 2016
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 4 of I True X3 Dash Cam, 2.7Inch LCD, 1080P, 170 degree Angle, and Night Vision. I found this camera on the Best Dash Cameras of 2016. I have installed three in my Daughter cars and one in my SUV as a safety feature. The most important feature this camera had that was the tempter range it works in. Both day and night video, sound quality, loop recording, easy setup, easy to use and has a very nice exterior design. The camera has met all expectations. The customer service was also very good; I contacted them for a hard wire system for one of the cars and had it in a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Krystina Brice

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking into a dash cam go with something else. Menu buttons rarely worked when I needed them to and removing the SD card is near impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Mason R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product with crystal clear recording
customer_reviews.text: Great Product with crystal clear recording. Its even clear during night driving. Highly recommend this product. U can see all the way around the front of your car with wide angle recording. Just ordered a second one for my second vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great picture, easy to use, a lot of nice options to it. When you hold it, it feels like a quality piece because it is!
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore levanti

customer_reviews.title: Stopped recording.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a few months but now won’t record over previous recordings. Did a reset, same result. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great Dash Cam with Great Service!
customer_reviews.text: Dash cam works great! High quality video and easy to operate. I'd buy it again... Customer service from iTrue has been fantastic as well! When I had a couple simple questions, they responded very quickly!
customer_reviews.author: dR Designs

customer_reviews.title: Works great. The set up is logical
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The set up is logical, and the buttons are easy to see and operate. Second dash cam I've had. The instructions were actually in real English (not Chinglish) and understandable! I took off a star because it looks too obvious with that big silver ring around the lens. (Where's my black permanent marker?)
customer_reviews.author: C. bessette

customer_reviews.title: Very good so far.
customer_reviews.text: A very good small camera. The video is pretty clear. You can see things clearly when driving in the night in the urban area. The field of view is good. The cable is long enough so that it can be hidden in the gaps of the window and go under your carpet. There is a USB port hidden in the plug. It is convenient to save an electric output if you have other devices. Though it didn't automatically start for 3 or 4 times since purchased in this Apri, it is not a problem with me anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Yu Lin

customer_reviews.title: Loses time and date
customer_reviews.text: This cam and my other (Cobra dash cam) both seem to run the same software and lose time and date everytime after setting it. And will be difficult to use in court when the time and date are off.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Dashcam
customer_reviews.text: The ITrue X3 was simple to install, thanks in part to a very clear, well written and straightforward manual. Navigation through the menu system is exactly as advertised, and the recorded results are excellent. I especially like the lens' very wide angle and ease of camera alignment and mounting using the included suction cup mount. I immediately swapped the included 8GB memory card for a 32GB, but if you don't mind a two hour overwrite cycle, the included card should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Motion Sensing Mode
customer_reviews.text: Camera works well, good quality picture, decent in low light. Only issues I've had are with motion sensing mode (MSM). While in MSM you can not access the menu or manually stop recording, you have to hold cam perfectly still or cover lens until recording stops. Then you can access menu to change settings. Nothing in instruction about this. While in MSM the camera tends to lock up and must be unplugged until battery dies to reset. I did buy the 32g card and formatted it as instructed. Still I am happy with unit and have captured some really good scenes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Memory card stuck, easy fix
customer_reviews.text: The 8gb memory card it came with was stuck in the unit and I couldn't get it out, not even with tweezers, so I just unscrewed the 3 screws on the unit (size #00), gently pulled the camera apart and pulled out the card. Screwed it back together and inserted my new card. Perfect, easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A+++ Dash Cam
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Dash Cam. Picture quality is excellent, perfect size. Works great. The only thing I would do different is eliminate all the silver as it makes the camera stand out and a little too obvious from outside the vehicle. I took a Sharpie and darkened the chrome. It is very well built. Mark
customer_reviews.author: Mark Muchow

customer_reviews.title: The X3 is an excellent dash camera which fully met my expectations
customer_reviews.text: The X3 is an excellent dash camera which fully met my expectations. I purchased the X3 to primarily record vacation travels. I recently used the X3 to record a 20 hour road trip vacation and it worked flawlessly. Setup was trivial and I had no problem with the suction cup which firmly held the X3 throughout the course of the trip. The HD 1080p video quality is excellent - nice and steady and crisp detail. I would definitely recommend the X3.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gps tracking not compatble with google maps and browser
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these for fleet use. The GPS feature worked fine at first. Now due to upgrades by Google the software that comes with the unit no longer works with Google. I tried contacting the seller and Google to no avail. Now I can't use the ones I bought. I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works just fine on the cold Alaska road ways good clear pictures even at night
customer_reviews.author: Ronald E Cheek

customer_reviews.title: I think I would like to have something looking out the back now that ...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing really left to be desired if you're not a professional. I think I would like to have something looking out the back now that I figured out how to wire this thing in my '16 F150. It's a little difficult bc the mirror isn't powered but you could prob open it up if you didn't care about breaking your truck.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Look good so far, three of them.
customer_reviews.text: Very good picture, easy to install. My wife was previously involved in three minor incidents and none of them was of the fault of her own. The insurance companies decided 50/50. No witnesses, no proof. Lost about three grands. Hopefully I don't have to use the camera as proof ever, but just in case. I was so happy how the camera work that, after two weeks I bought two more, for each of our cars.
customer_reviews.author: G. S. Lazureanu

customer_reviews.title: Great camera and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: This product is sharp and very responsive to light changes. Night scene is great and the 170 degree camera angle is helpful. The feel and quality of this cameras workmanship is like holding a mini SLR camera. I specially like the HDMI (provided) cable. The convenience of just plugging it in your tv's hdmi input is top notch. Now I can see it on a 55" LED screen.It is nice having this as a witness to any events that may happen.
customer_reviews.author: Pazetronics

customer_reviews.title: I love my dash cam
customer_reviews.text: I love my dash cam. It automatically turns on when I start my car and automatically turns off when I shut off my car. It is easy to set up and use. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Barreca

customer_reviews.title: Plug-&-play ready, strong suction cup, works most of the time
customer_reviews.text: The iTrue x3 was plug-and-play ready with a 4gig memory card. LCD screen is a nice feature but speed/GPS feature not included. Power cord is plenty long, and has a usb port so you can charge your phone too. Suction cup works well, holds in 100F+ exterior temps (Southern California) and is easily moved from car to car and can tilt -/+ angles (I drive trucks for work with vertical windshields). Two issues: overheating occurs when its hot outside and the camera freezes/prevents recording... and the night quality. Its okay at best, very hard to read license plates and street signs
customer_reviews.author: finkey01

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: It's very hard to access the menu buttons, they don't work very often, now the unit has come apart, the case has split open, and I have to use straps to hold it together, I've tried to contact the seller with no response, there has to be better units out there to chose from
customer_reviews.author: David A. Durocher

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very clear video, easy to use. I bought this if someone makes a false insurance claim in the case of an accident. Happened to me once already and I don't plan on it happening again with this.
customer_reviews.author: bank of vito

customer_reviews.title: You are not going to find a better dash camera anywhere for this price
customer_reviews.text: You are not going to find a better dash camera anywhere for this price. It is incredibly easy to set up and use. I bought 2, one for my truck and another for my wife's pathfinder. The picture is very crisp and you can see great detail (i.e. license plates) making it very handy in case of an accident. I strongly recommend this dash cam to anyone in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamim Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dash cam.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent video and sound quality. Have been using the X3 for 4months now, without a hiccup. Really impressed with the price and performance.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Daytime and nighttime recordings are excellent (dusk and nighttime recordings look a little dark on ...
customer_reviews.text: I 've used it for 2 weeks and it has worked flawlessly. Set-up and installation were simple. Memory card was pre-installed. Daytime and nighttime recordings are excellent (dusk and nighttime recordings look a little dark on the iTtue display but playback on a PC is very clear). Plan to add the GPS unit soon
customer_reviews.author: mike p

customer_reviews.title: I first bought a cheaper different brand that never worked ...
customer_reviews.text: I first bought a cheaper different brand that never worked right. I returned it and bought this. I have been using it for about 6 weeks now and have no issues at all so far. Just ordered another one for the wife's car.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The camera is easy to view
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this camera for about three months and has been flawless. The camera is easy to view, field of view is very wide and extremely clear. This itrue camera replaced a well known camera (co&$a) that constantly rebooted or shut off I am extremely happy with the itrue camera. I am considering buying another to put in rear window of my truck to record behind me. I am very satisfied with this product. I purchased and had in 2 days prime what else could you ask for!!!
customer_reviews.author: J Jorda

customer_reviews.title: Cant go wrong with this dash cam
customer_reviews.text: Nice dash cam very clear anytime day or night. Holds well to winshield. Used now for few months great product. I had another dash cam as gift sold it and bought this dash cam. Other unit was garbage next to this dash cam.
customer_reviews.author: lawrence d nolen

customer_reviews.title: So far they have been working flawlessly and are very low maintenance which I like.
customer_reviews.text: Got 2, one for my mom and one for me. So far they have been working flawlessly and are very low maintenance which I like.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Robles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dash camera. Ordered one more
customer_reviews.text: My husband has used X3 for a while and it worked perfect. I ordered another one, and it worked perfect as the first one we had. It works brilliantly. Great product with detailed user manual.Picture quality is excellent and operations are easy, window mount is good. I don't need to remove it every time, just remove memory card to review on PC. The 8GB card can hold around 1.5 hours of footage which is plenty give it auto overwrites the oldest footage.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product is top notch . Very easy to install and use.picture/video quality is excellent. This is installed in my service truck and the piece of mind that comes with a dash cam of this quality is priceless . Overall a great value, great product , fast secure shipping .
customer_reviews.author: scotty

customer_reviews.title: Great unit. The seller is very informative and ready ...
customer_reviews.text: Great unit. The seller is very informative and ready to answer any questions/concerns. The video quality is great and it is nice to not have to worry about turning it on or having enough space since it just automatically turns on with the car and is equipped with loop record.
customer_reviews.author: Brock04

product_meta.title: ITrue X3 Dash Cam,2.7Inch LCD,1080P,170 Degree Angle,Night Vision and 8GB Card
product_meta.description:
Features:

 -Start/Stop recording automatically after turning on/off the ignition. 

 -Endless looping mode. Works automatically without any human touch. 

 -Accident Auto Detection Feature (G-Sensor) can locks data to memory. 

 -1920x1080Full-HD resolution at 30 fps with H.264 compression technology 

 -Excellent night vision by AR0330 170 degree 6-layers glass lens 

 -Wide Dynamic (WDR) Technology 

 -2.7 inch 4:3 LCD 



Specifications:

 -Video Resolution:1080FHD 1920×1080. 

 -File Format: Video: MOV. 

 -Motion Detection: Support. 

 -Memory Card: Support up to 32GB Micro SD/TF Card. 

 -USB: Support. 

 -Audio Recording: Support. 

 -Operating Temperature: 10°F to 140°F.(We recommend remove the dash cam from the windshield when parking) 



Package Includes:

 -ITRUE X3 Dash Camera 

 -In car charging cable 

 -Mounting holder for camera 

 -USB cable 

 -User Manual

 -8 GB MicroSD card



Highlights:

1. Battery is mainly used to save files in emergency. Please always connect X3 to external power while it is in use.

2. Motion detection should be set to OFF in recording while driving to avoid randomly stopping recording and small files saved.

3. If there is no SD card in the box, it means the card has been already inserted into the camera.
feature_bullets: Emergency Lock Button & Accident Auto Detection Feature (G-Sensor) can lock current video file to memory.

Full-HD Video 1920x1080 at 30 fps, super wide 170° angle. Auto Record - Auto On/Off along with your Car turning on or off. Endless looping mode and auto On/Off. Works automatically without any human touch.
Excellent Night-vision by 6-layer Glass lenses and unique WDR (Wide Dynamic Range) video system (Similar to HDR technology in Camera).
Unique front surface with simulated stitched leather-style can cut reflections and makes it more classy than other dash cams with just a plain black plastic case.
One Year Manufacturer Warranty To Cover Any Issues. MicroSD card included.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars664 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
